summary: A follower for all those thieves/assassins with complete LORE!
descriptionHtml:
This is my[u] FIRST [/u]follower mod i have ever made, It is also the first mod I have ever put up on the Nexus. I would appreciate it if you downloaded this. This is pretty much just a test mod I made because I am learning modding.

[b] LORE [/b]

BackStory
Sneaky Thief was at one point a member of the Dark Brotherhood. He was one of the best, He completed several contacts all with flying colors, He was starting to be feared by the public. He was so feared that the guards of Falkreath by demand of the empire sent over a guard to try to negotiate with Astrid. They made a deal, In return for their safety and a hefty bit of gold for Sneaky Thief. They planed to send Sneaky Thief on a fake contract to kill the Jarl of Whiterun. When Sneaky Thief entered the guards jumped on the doors and the rest of the guards jumped on Sneaky Thief. The plan succeeded and they captured Sneaky Thief and locked him up in the Whiterun Dungeons.

Name
As part of the agreement the Dark Brother they never had to turn over Sneaky Thief's Name. In return the empire has brandished Sneaky Thief as well... A Sneaky Thief. Sneaky Thief's real name has been lost to time so now he is named Sneaky Thief.
author: CommanderSamcool1
